text: Bombooflat is a census town in Andaman district of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands, a union territory of India. It is also known as Bombūflat or Bamboo Flat. ==Demographics== India census, Bombooflat had a population of 6790. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bombooflat has an average literacy rate of 72%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 77% and female literacy of 67%. 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== *World Gazetteer: Bombūflat (coordinates and population) Category:Cities and towns in South Andaman district Category:South Andaman Island
title: Bombooflat
